sentences.en: Albert Jones' new style will inevitably put him in touch with a much more diverse and perhaps younger audience.
sentences.cn: 艾伯特·琼斯的新风格无疑将使他接触更多形形色色的、或许更年轻的观众。

sentences.en: But later in the century, views on management became more diverse.
sentences.cn: 可是到了20世纪后期, 对管理的看法就不那么一致了.

sentences.en: Davies has managed to pursue his diverse interests in parallel with his fast-moving career.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯在事业突飞猛进的同时并未放弃自己广泛的兴趣爱好。

sentences.en: Eventually all over the room clocks of diverse pattern musically chimed eleven.
sentences.cn: 最后,房间各式各样的钟都悦耳地敲了十一点钟.

sentences.en: Housing and diverse business are located near the CBD.
sentences.cn: 住宅和各种企业也均位于接近中心商业区的地方.

sentences.en: I have been forced to admit diverse propositions which appear somewhat deplorable.
sentences.cn: 我曾被迫承认各种各样多少有点不幸的命题.

sentences.en: Industrial unions generally comprise a number of diverse groups.
sentences.cn: 产业工会一般由许多各种各样的集团组成.

sentences.en: Jones has a much more diverse and perhaps younger audience.
sentences.cn: 琼斯的观众群更为多样化而且可能更年轻。

sentences.en: Reinforced plastics possess many diverse properties.
sentences.cn: 增强塑料具有多种性能.

sentences.en: Soil micro - organisms constitute a diverse and ubiquitous group of organisms.
sentences.cn: 土壤微生物是由完全不同的和无孔不入的有机体类群所组成.

sentences.en: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.cn: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

sentences.en: The building houses a wide and diverse variety of antiques.
sentences.cn: 这栋楼里摆放着大量各式各样的古董。

sentences.en: The histories of the Europeans are too long, their interests too diverse.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人的历史太悠久, 他们的利害关系太相互悬殊.

sentences.en: The Judaeo-Christian tradition is diverse, jumbled, contradictory, at every point inviting inquiry and debate.
sentences.cn: 犹太-基督教传统呈现多样化，混乱复杂，相互矛盾，在各个方面都会引发质疑和争论。

sentences.en: The word is now used in a sense diverse from the original meaning.
sentences.cn: 在某种意义上说,此词现在的含义与最初的含义完全不同.

sentences.en: This term covers a diverse range of products.
sentences.cn: 这一术语涉及到不同范围的产品.

sentences.en: Though most rocks are elementally similar, they are mineralogically and texturally diverse.
sentences.cn: 虽然大多数岩石在元素成分方面是近似的, 但它们在矿物成分和结构上却是各不相同.

sentences.en: Today's businesses are increasingly complex and diverse.
sentences.cn: 今日的企业单位日趋复杂和多样化.

words.tran_cn: 分歧；分叉；意见不同；分支
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

trans.tran_en: If a group of things is diverse, it is made up of a wide variety of things
